newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech govt agency says plans to sell Skoda stake.
newsitem.headline: Czech govt agency says plans to sell Skoda stake.

text.p: The Czech government privatisation agency, the National Property Fund (NPF), said on Wednesday it was planning to sell a 8.7 percent stake it holds in engineering concern Skoda a.s. soon.
NPF spokesman told Reuters the stake would probably be sold on the capital market within weeks if no property restitution claims appeared which could block it.
